Not sure if this goes here, but I don\'t see a more appropriate sub forum.

If I buy KSP again with my account that already has it, will I be able to give the copy to a friend somehow?

Is there another way to give the gift of space to my friends who don\'t have paypal accounts or credit cards?
Make your friend an account of his own, then buy it for him using the new account. This is what a friend of mine did for me, then I just gave him the cash.
